prompt:
### Instruction: Act as a technical assistant. Give me a list of all correct answers to the following question without further explanations.
Which data categories fit in the context of the GDPR for the processing activity titled 3G Rule in the Workplace with the description: 'Checking and documenting your 3G (Recovered, Vaccinated, Tested) status as a prerequisite for access to the workplace'?
a. Name 
b. Date of the check 
c. Vacation days
 d. Professional position 
e. Status of the proof 
f. Bank account details 
g. Expiry date of the vaccination and recovery status 
h. IP address 


 ### Answer:
answer:
a. Name 
 b. Date of the check 
 e. Status of the proof 
 g. Expiry date of the vaccination and recovery status
